verses.text: Many years later, during \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w reign|strong="H4438"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Artaxerxes \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w*, \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Seraiah|strong="H8304"\w*, \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w*, \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w*,

\w the|strong="H6659"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w*, \w the|strong="H6659"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w*, \w the|strong="H6659"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahitub,

\w the|strong="H5838"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Amariah, \w the|strong="H5838"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w*, \w the|strong="H5838"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Meraioth|strong="H4812"\w*,

\w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zerahiah|strong="H2228"\w*, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Uzzi|strong="H5813"\w*, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Bukki|strong="H1231"\w*,

\w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Abishua, \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w*, \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Eleazar, \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*—

\w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* \w came|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* Babylon. \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w* \w skilled|strong="H4106"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w granted|strong="H5414"\w* \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* requests, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7651"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Artaxerxes, \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w with|strong="H3389"\w* \w some|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, \w including|strong="H4428"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w singers|strong="H7891"\w*, \w gatekeepers|strong="H7778"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w temple|strong="H5411"\w* \w servants|strong="H5411"\w*.

Ezra arrived \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H8141"\w* \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H8141"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H8141"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* begun \w the|strong="H5921"\w* journey \w from|strong="H5921"\w* Babylon \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w day|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* arrived \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w day|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w gracious|strong="H2896"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H3559"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w study|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w practice|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* \w its|strong="H6213"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w ordinances|strong="H4941"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* text \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w letter|strong="H5406"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Artaxerxes \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, \w an|strong="H5414"\w* expert \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

Artaxerxes, \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w*. \w To|strong="H4430"\w* \w Ezra|strong="H5831"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w priest|strong="H3549"\w*, \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5613"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w Law|strong="H1882"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* God \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*: Greetings.

\w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w hereby|strong="H4481"\w* \w decree|strong="H2942"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w any|strong="H3606"\w* volunteers \w among|strong="H5974"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* Israelites \w in|strong="H4437"\w* \w my|strong="H4481"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*, including \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w priests|strong="H3549"\w* \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3879"\w*, may \w go|strong="H1946"\w* \w up|strong="H1946"\w* \w with|strong="H5974"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*.

\w You|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* \w by|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w seven|strong="H7655"\w* \w counselors|strong="H3272"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* evaluate \w Judah|strong="H3061"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w* \w according|strong="H4481"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w Law|strong="H1882"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w your|strong="H1768"\w* God, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w your|strong="H1768"\w* \w hand|strong="H3028"\w*.

Moreover, \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w to|strong="H3390"\w* take with \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w silver|strong="H3702"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H1768"\w* \w counselors|strong="H3272"\w* \w have|strong="H1768"\w* \w freely|strong="H5069"\w* \w offered|strong="H5069"\w* \w to|strong="H3390"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* God \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w*, \w whose|strong="H1768"\w* \w dwelling|strong="H4907"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*,

together \w with|strong="H5974"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w silver|strong="H3702"\w* \w and|strong="H1722"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* may \w find|strong="H7912"\w* \w in|strong="H7912"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w province|strong="H4083"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* Babylon, \w as|strong="H3606"\w* well \w as|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w freewill|strong="H5069"\w* offerings \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w people|strong="H5972"\w* \w and|strong="H1722"\w* \w priests|strong="H3549"\w* \w to|strong="H5974"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w their|strong="H3606"\w* God \w in|strong="H7912"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*.

\w With|strong="H5922"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w money|strong="H3702"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H3606"\w*, \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w buy|strong="H7066"\w* \w as|strong="H3606"\w* many \w bulls|strong="H8450"\w*, \w rams|strong="H1798"\w*, \w and|strong="H3702"\w* lambs \w as|strong="H3606"\w* needed, together \w with|strong="H5922"\w* \w their|strong="H3606"\w* grain \w offerings|strong="H5261"\w* \w and|strong="H3702"\w* \w drink|strong="H5261"\w* \w offerings|strong="H5261"\w*, \w and|strong="H3702"\w* \w offer|strong="H7127"\w* \w them|strong="H1994"\w* \w on|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w altar|strong="H4056"\w* \w at|strong="H6903"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w your|strong="H1768"\w* God \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*.

\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H1722"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* brothers may \w do|strong="H5648"\w* \w whatever|strong="H4101"\w* seems best \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w silver|strong="H3702"\w* \w and|strong="H1722"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w*, \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H4101"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* God.

\w You|strong="H1768"\w* must \w deliver|strong="H8000"\w* \w to|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* God \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w* all \w the|strong="H6925"\w* articles \w given|strong="H3052"\w* \w to|strong="H6925"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w service|strong="H6402"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w your|strong="H1768"\w* God.

\w And|strong="H5308"\w* if anything else \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w needed|strong="H2819"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w your|strong="H1768"\w* God \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* may \w have|strong="H1768"\w* \w occasion|strong="H5308"\w* \w to|strong="H5308"\w* supply, \w you|strong="H1768"\w* may \w pay|strong="H5415"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w it|strong="H4481"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w royal|strong="H4430"\w* \w treasury|strong="H1596"\w*.

\w I|strong="H4481"\w*, \w King|strong="H4430"\w* Artaxerxes, \w decree|strong="H2942"\w* \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w treasurers|strong="H1490"\w* west \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* Euphrates: \w Whatever|strong="H3606"\w* \w Ezra|strong="H5831"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w priest|strong="H3549"\w*, \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5613"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w Law|strong="H1882"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* God \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, may \w require|strong="H7593"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w*, \w it|strong="H4481"\w* must be provided promptly,

up \w to|strong="H5705"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3969"\w* \w talents|strong="H3604"\w* \w of|strong="H3734"\w* \w silver|strong="H3702"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3969"\w* \w cors|strong="H3734"\w* \w of|strong="H3734"\w* \w wheat|strong="H2591"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3969"\w* \w baths|strong="H1325"\w* \w of|strong="H3734"\w* \w wine|strong="H2562"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3969"\w* \w baths|strong="H1325"\w* \w of|strong="H3734"\w* olive \w oil|strong="H4887"\w*, \w and|strong="H3702"\w* \w salt|strong="H4416"\w* \w without|strong="H3809"\w* limit.

\w Whatever|strong="H4101"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w commanded|strong="H4481"\w* \w by|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* God \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* must \w be|strong="H1934"\w* \w done|strong="H5648"\w* diligently \w for|strong="H5922"\w* \w His|strong="H5922"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w*. \w For|strong="H5922"\w* \w why|strong="H4101"\w* \w should|strong="H4101"\w* \w wrath|strong="H7109"\w* fall \w on|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w realm|strong="H4437"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w sons|strong="H1123"\w*?

\w And|strong="H1005"\w* \w be|strong="H3809"\w* advised \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H1768"\w* \w no|strong="H3809"\w* \w authority|strong="H7990"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w impose|strong="H7412"\w* \w tribute|strong="H4061"\w*, duty, \w or|strong="H3809"\w* \w toll|strong="H1983"\w* \w on|strong="H5922"\w* \w any|strong="H3606"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w priests|strong="H3549"\w*, \w Levites|strong="H3879"\w*, \w singers|strong="H2171"\w*, \w doorkeepers|strong="H8652"\w*, \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w servants|strong="H6399"\w*, \w or|strong="H3809"\w* other \w servants|strong="H6399"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* God.

\w And|strong="H2452"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w*, \w Ezra|strong="H5831"\w*, according \w to|strong="H3046"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2452"\w* \w of|strong="H1768"\w* \w your|strong="H1768"\w* God, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* possess, \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w to|strong="H3046"\w* \w appoint|strong="H4483"\w* \w magistrates|strong="H8200"\w* \w and|strong="H2452"\w* \w judges|strong="H1782"\w* \w to|strong="H3046"\w* \w judge|strong="H1934"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w people|strong="H5972"\w* west \w of|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* Euphrates—\w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w know|strong="H3046"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w laws|strong="H1882"\w* \w of|strong="H1768"\w* \w your|strong="H1768"\w* God. \w And|strong="H2452"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w to|strong="H3046"\w* \w teach|strong="H3046"\w* these \w laws|strong="H1882"\w* \w to|strong="H3046"\w* \w anyone|strong="H3606"\w* \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w does|strong="H1934"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w know|strong="H3046"\w* them.

\w If|strong="H2006"\w* \w anyone|strong="H3606"\w* \w does|strong="H5648"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* keep \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w law|strong="H1882"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w your|strong="H1768"\w* God \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w law|strong="H1882"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, let \w a|strong="H3068"\w* strict \w judgment|strong="H1780"\w* \w be|strong="H1934"\w* \w executed|strong="H5648"\w* \w against|strong="H1768"\w* \w him|strong="H4481"\w*, \w whether|strong="H2006"\w* \w death|strong="H4193"\w*, \w banishment|strong="H8332"\w*, \w confiscation|strong="H6065"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* property, \w or|strong="H2006"\w* imprisonment.

\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* fathers, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w so|strong="H5414"\w* \w honor|strong="H6286"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*,
